Articles.Content:
You know those times when you land at KSC in a reusable plane but you forgot a docking port to refuel it?

Remember those times when you land a damaged plane, but can't take off again?

Does this sound like a commercial?

Yeah it does...

ANYWAYS

Going INTO the hanger should be part of the game. If you could go into it you can:

Refuel

Repair

Add things on

Take in rescued craft

And more!

And yeah.

You could even reuse shuttles, like adding a reserve slot!

i think there is a mod for that, anyways if your in the KSC just recover.

and if you want refueling just have a claw and a refueler on KSC on standby
